structure.unit: Real And Personal Property And Domestic Relations
Descent And Distribution, Wills, Estates Of Deceased Persons And Absentees, Guardianship, Conservatorship And Trusts

law.text: [ Text of section effective until March 31, 2012. Repealed by 2008, 521, Sec. 10. See 2008, 521, Sec. 44 as amended by 2010, 409, Sec. 23 and 2011, 224.] During the life of the testator such will shall be delivered only to him or in accordance with his order in writing duly verified by the oath of a subscribing witness; and after his death it shall be delivered to the person named in the endorsement, if such person demands it.
